sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RingIn</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RingIn</name>
        <script><![CDATA[//https://github.com/mfogel/polygon-clipping/blob/v0.15.3/src/geom-in.js
var RingIn = Class.create();
RingIn.prototype = {
	initialize: function (geomRing, poly, isExterior) {
		if (!Array.isArray(geomRing) || geomRing.length === 0) {
			throw new Error('Input geometry is not a valid Polygon or MultiPolygon');
		}

		this.poly = poly;
		this.isExterior = isExterior;
		this.segments = [];

		if (typeof geomRing[0][0] !== 'number' || typeof geomRing[0][1] !== 'number') {
			throw new Error('Input geometry is not a valid Polygon or MultiPolygon');
		}

		var firstPoint = PtRounder.rounder.round(geomRing[0][0], geomRing[0][1]);
		this.bbox = {
			ll: {
				x: firstPoint.x,
				y: firstPoint.y
			},
			ur: {
				x: firstPoint.x,
				y: firstPoint.y
			},
		};

		var prevPoint = firstPoint;
		for (var i = 1, iMax = geomRing.length; i < iMax; i++) {
			if (typeof geomRing[i][0] !== 'number' || typeof geomRing[i][1] !== 'number') {
				throw new Error('Input geometry is not a valid Polygon or MultiPolygon');
			}
			var point = PtRounder.rounder.round(geomRing[i][0], geomRing[i][1]);
			// skip repeated points
			if (point.x === prevPoint.x && point.y === prevPoint.y) continue;
			this.segments.push(Segment.fromRing(prevPoint, point, this));
			if (point.x < this.bbox.ll.x) this.bbox.ll.x = point.x;
			if (point.y < this.bbox.ll.y) this.bbox.ll.y = point.y;
			if (point.x > this.bbox.ur.x) this.bbox.ur.x = point.x;
			if (point.y > this.bbox.ur.y) this.bbox.ur.y = point.y;
			prevPoint = point;
		}
		// add segment from last to first if last is not the same as first
		if (firstPoint.x !== prevPoint.x || firstPoint.y !== prevPoint.y) {
			this.segments.push(Segment.fromRing(prevPoint, firstPoint, this));
		}
	},
	getSweepEvents: function () {
		var sweepEvents = [];
		for (var i = 0, iMax = this.segments.length; i < iMax; i++) {
			var segment = this.segments[i];
			sweepEvents.push(segment.leftSE);
			sweepEvents.push(segment.rightSE);
		}
		return sweepEvents;
	},

	type: 'RingIn',

};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-01-24 09:09:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3faac89a88e82110fa9bf275d1a04356</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RingIn</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">fa60558563b044509d2cba84af9c019c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">fa60558563b044509d2cba84af9c019c</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3faac89a88e82110fa9bf275d1a04356</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-01-30 14:21:08</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
